content:
116 settlements and 116 infrastructure sites were attacked.

About thisMarch 6 reportedMilitary Media Center of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

According to him, the Russians used different types of weapons: mortars, artillery, tanks, RSZV, SCR, UAV and tactical aviation.

There are killed and injured among civilians, the number of victims is clarified.

BeforeIt became knownthat the amounts were attacked by the Shahaneda at night.
title: The enemy fired at 13 regions of Ukraine a day
description: On March 6 this was reported by Military Media Center of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. By...
author: Army Inform
